channel.title: Chris' Dialogue
channel.description: A blog of Chris, a human who love to learn more about himself and the world

item.title: Why I blog here.
item.description: Hi. I have been blogging in both Medium and dev.to for a really long time. It’s time for me to try hosting my own blog, so here it is. Here…
item.content:encoded:
Hi. I have been blogging in both Medium and dev.to for a really long time.

It’s time for me to try hosting my own blog, so here it is.

Here is a source code of this blog. I wrote a scraper for some content platform that I put a content into, so you can use those as an inspiration or prototype.
